meanings.definition: A stringed musical instrument played with a bow, typically having four strings tuned in perfect fifths.
meanings.sent1: She practiced the violins every day to prepare for the concert.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra sounded beautiful with the violins playing in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The violins seemed to whisper secrets to each other as they played.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the violins, creating a melody that touched the soul.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the violins filled the room, enchanting everyone who listened.

meanings.definition: A person who plays the violin.
meanings.sent1: The violins in the orchestra were all talented musicians.
meanings.sent2: She became a skilled violins after years of practice.
meanings.sent3: The violins gathered for a group lesson to improve their skills.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the best violins in the city, captivating audiences with his performances.
meanings.sent5: The young violins practiced diligently, dreaming of becoming professional musicians one day.
